message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that has the potential to be extremely valuable. While I can't disclose the exact details yet, I can assure you it's worth at least $1000000 to me.  I'm confident it will be even more valuable to the right person.  I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000.  This is a significant discount from what I believe it could be worth.  Think about the potential, and let me know your decision.
